channel.title: Comments on: Siri made me stupid, or Did you know you can set an iPhone alarm to repeat every day?
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: Ray, I applaud your accomplishments... and I too am guilty of doing this at times, but if ever there was an article that was the poster child for why we should at least come in casual contact with a manual, it's this one.
item.content:encoded: Ray, I applaud your accomplishments… and I too am guilty of doing this at times, but if ever there was an article that was the poster child for why we should at least come in casual contact with a manual, it’s this one.

item.title: By: Squink
item.dc:creator: Squink
item.description: Yo mama so stupid, she asked Siri to set an alarm for 7 in the morning on her android..
item.content:encoded: Yo mama so stupid, she asked Siri to set an alarm for 7 in the morning on her android..

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: What? You're kidding me! Has it always done that, or is that something new with 8.0?
item.content:encoded: What? You’re kidding me! Has it always done that, or is that something new with 8.0?

item.title: By: Tom Drake
item.dc:creator: Tom Drake
item.description: You know you can ask Siri to; "set an alarm for 7am on weekdays" and it'll do it too!
item.content:encoded: You know you can ask Siri to; “set an alarm for 7am on weekdays” and it’ll do it too!

item.title: By: Jon Daley
item.dc:creator: Jon Daley
item.description: You do realize that the same is possible on android, right?
item.content:encoded: You do realize that the same is possible on android, right?

item.title: By: bob
item.dc:creator: bob
item.description: Is this what iPhone users consider exiting these days?
item.content:encoded: Is this what iPhone users consider exiting these days?
